messages.title: Straight talking
messages.content: Britain is now ruled by an unelected undemocratic elite based in Brussels. The European Union can and will abolish the Pound and there is nothing the Britishgovernment can do to stop it. The Conservatives, Labour and Lib Dems all lied when they promised a referendum on the Lisbon Treaty, Only UKIP will save the Pound and the British economy by withdrawing from the EU.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Say YES to referendums on all major issues
Say NO to wasting Â£45 million a day in Brussels

issues.brexitEurope: Britain is now ruled by an unelected undemocratic elite based in Brussels.
issues.economy: Only UKIP will save the Pound and the British economy by withdrawing from the EU.
issues.education: With 100 different languages spoken in London schools, I would campaign for every child starting school to speak English and for pre-school classes in English to be provided if necessary.
issues.environment: Walthamstow Greyhound Stadium should be bought back and re-opened. People need leisure and this is what the Greyhound Stadium provided in a unique and unthreatening way.
issues.governance: Say YES to referendums on all major issues

housing.content: Walthamstow Greyhound Stadium should be bought back and re-opened. People need leisure and this is what the Greyhound Stadium provided in a unique and unthreatening way.
